title: Succession and k-selection, with 5 answer options

content.question: In the process of succession, which of the following is true of K-selected plant species?

choices.label: They keep their carrying capacity at a minimum level.
They usually reproduce early in life.
They are usually found in climax stages of succession.
They are the dominant species in early stages of succession.

content.answer: They are usually found in climax stages of succession.
